verses.content: Hieng hi Noa naupasal, Sem, Ham, le Japheth thlahai chu an nih; tuilêt hnunga naupasal an ineihai chu.
Japheth naupasalhai chu: Gomer, Magog, Madai, Javan, Tubal, Mesek le Tiras an nih.
Gomer naupasalhai chu: Askenaz, Riphath le Togarma an nih.
Javan naupasalhai chu: Elisa, Tarsis, Kittim le Dodanim an nih.
Chuonghaia inthawk chun a nih tuipui kama hnamhai chu anni ram ramah an indar ta chu: anni ṭawng ang pei le, anni hnam ang peiin, anni chihai laia seng chun.
Ham naupasalhai chu: Kush, Mizraim, Put le Kanaan an nih.
Kush naupasalhai chu Seba, Havila, Sabta, Raama le Sabteka hai an nih. Raama naupasalhai chu Sheba le Dedan an nih.
Kush chun naupasal Nimrod a nei a: ama chu hnuoia mi hrât hmasatak a nih.
LALPA hmaha ramsuok mi hrâttak a nih; chulei chun a nih, “LALPA hmaha ramsuok mi hrâttak Nimrod ang a nih,” an ti hlak chu.
Ân lal phutna chu Sinar rama Babel, Erek, Akkad le Kalne khuo a nih.
Chu rama inthawk chun a suok a, Assuriaah a lût a, Ninevi, Rehoboth-Ir, Kala le,
Ninevi le Kala inkâra Resen khuohai a siem a (chu Resen chu khaw ropuitak a nih).
Chun, Mizraim chun Lud, Anam, Lahab, Naphtu,
Pathrus, Kaslu (Philistinhai suokna) le Kaphtor mihai a thlah a.
Kanaan chun a nau lutîrah Zidon a nei a, Heth khawm a nei bawk a;
Jebus-hai, Amor-hai, Girgas- hai,
Hiv-hai, Arko-hai, Sin-hai,
Arvad-hai, Zemar-hai, Hamat- hai, a thlah a; chu hnunga chun Kanaan hnamhai chu an hung indar lien pei tah a.
Chun, Kanaan hnamhai ramri chu Zidona inthawkin Gerar pan zâwngin Gaza chenin; Sodom, Gomorra, Adma le Zeboiim pan zâwngin, Lasa chenin a nih.
Chuonghai chu Ham thlahai chu an nih, anni hnamhai ang pei le anni ṭawng ang peiin, anni ram rama le anni chi lai chun.
Sem, Eber nau po pohai thlatu, Japheth u khawm chun nauhai a nei veh a.
Sem naupasalhai chu: Elam, Assur, Arpaksad, Lud le Aram an nih.
Aram nauhai chu: Uz, Hul, Gether le Mash an nih.
Arpaksad chun naupasal Sela a nei a; Sela chun naupasal Eber a nei a.
Eber chun naupasal pahni a nei a: pakhat hming chu Peleg a na, a dam lai chun hnuoi hi ṭhein a um ta sih a, a sang hming chu Joktan a nih.
Joktan chun naupasal Almodad, Seleph, Hazarmaveth, Jera,
Hadoram, Uzal, Dikla,
Obal, Abimael, Seba,
Ophir, Havila le Jobab a nei a: chuong po po chu Joktan naupasalhai an nih.
Chun, an umna chu Mesaa inthawkin khawsak tlâng Sephar pan zâwngin a nih.
Chuonghai chu Sem thlahai chu an nih a, anni hnamhai ang pei le anni ṭawnghai ang peiin, anni ram ramhaiah, anni chihai ang pei chun.
Chuonghai chu Noa thlahai hnamhai an nih a, an thlahai ang peiin, an chihai lai chun: tui lêt hnungin chuonghaia inthawk chun a nih, hnuoia hin chi tin an indar ta chu.
